statements: DELETE FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE id = 1 AND full_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM dual_citizenship_info WHERE citizenship_country_1 = 'USA' OR citizenship_country_2 = 'UK';
DELETE FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE person_id = 100 AND status = 'Inactive';
DELETE FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE person_id=100 AND status='approved';
DELETE FROM dual_citizenship_status WHERE status = 'Pending' AND citizenship1 = 'USA'
